service.name: Jenkins
service.description: This service runs Jenkins continuous integration system. 8080
service.arguments: -Dhudson.model.DirectoryBrowserSupport.CSP="sandbox allow-same-origin allow-scripts; default-src 'self'; script-src * 'unsafe-eval'; img-src *; style-src * 'unsafe-inline'; font-src *" -jar agent.jar -jnlpUrl http://localhost:8080/computer/windows/jenkins-agent.jnlp -secret 691038d80db3c72cb348e704aad16aec740833fc09c155f27bc8c155905e588c -workDir "c:\tools\jenkins-agent"
